name: Disco D
description: '''David Aaron Shayman''' (September 21, 1980 â€“ January 23, 2007), better known by his stage name '''Disco D''', was an American record producer and composer.  He started as a teenage DJ in [[Ann Arbor]], [[Michigan]], where he helped DJ Godfather popularize the [[Detroit]] [[electronic music]] called "[[Ghettotech]]".
